mapper.sql: id, users_id, android_device_policy_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time
mapper.insert: insert into android_device_users (users_id, android_device_policy_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time) values (#{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into android_device_users
users_id,
android_device_policy_id,
create_date,
create_user,
update_date,
update_user,
delete_time,
#{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update android_device_users
users_id = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update android_device_users set users_id = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.user_name as username, real_name as realname from users t1 where t1.delete_time is null and t1.is_lock is null or t1.is_lock='0' and t1.is_active is null or t1.is_active ='1' and t1.org_id = #{orgId}

select t1.users_id as usersId, t2.user_name as username, t2.real_name as realname from android_device_users t1 inner join users t2 on t1.users_id = t2.id and t2.delete_time is null where t1.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update android_device_users set delete_time = now() where android_device_policy_id = #{id} and delete_time is null
mapper.select: select t1.users_id as usersId from android_device_users t1 left join users t2 on t1.users_id = t2.id where t1.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.users_id as usersId, t1.android_device_policy_id as androidDevicePolicyId, t1.update_date as updateDate from android_device_users t1 left join android_device_policy t2 on t1.android_device_policy_id = t2.id where t1.delete_time is null and t2.delete_time is null and t1.users_id = #{params.userId} and t2.is_enable = 1 and t2.org_id = #{params.orgId} and t1.android_device_policy_id != #{params.id} order by t1.update_date desc

SELECT id, users_id as usersId, android_device_policy_id as androidDevicePolicyId, update_date as updateDate FROM android_device_users WHERE users_id=#{usersId} AND android_device_policy_id=#{androidDevicePolicyId} AND delete_time is null ORDER BY update_date desc LIMIT 1

SELECT android_device_policy_id FROM ( SELECT android_device_policy_id,android_device_department.update_date FROM users LEFT JOIN android_device_department ON android_device_department.org_structure_id=users.group_id LEFT JOIN android_device_policy ON android_device_policy.id=android_device_department.android_device_policy_id WHERE android_device_department.delete_time is NULL AND android_device_policy.org_id=#{1} AND users.delete_time is NULL AND android_device_policy.delete_time is NULL AND users.id=#{0} AND android_device_policy.is_enable!=0
UNION
SELECT android_device_policy_id,android_device_virtual_group.update_date FROM android_device_virtual_group LEFT JOIN android_device_policy ON android_device_policy.id=android_device_virtual_group.android_device_policy_id LEFT JOIN virtual_group ON android_device_virtual_group.virtual_group_id=virtual_group.id LEFT JOIN users_virtual_group ON users_virtual_group.virtual_id=virtual_group.id WHERE android_device_virtual_group.delete_time is NULL AND android_device_policy.delete_time is NULL AND android_device_policy.org_id=#{1} AND virtual_group.delete_time is NULL AND users_virtual_group.delete_time is NULL AND users_virtual_group.user_id=#{0} AND android_device_policy.is_enable!=0
UNION
SELECT android_device_policy_id,android_device_users.update_date FROM android_device_users LEFT JOIN android_device_policy ON android_device_policy.id=android_device_users.android_device_policy_id WHERE android_device_users.delete_time is NULL AND android_device_policy.delete_time is NULL AND android_device_policy.org_id=#{1} AND users_id=#{0} AND android_device_policy.is_enable!=0 ) as t ORDER BY update_date desc LIMIT 1
SELECT id,android_device_policy_id,users_id,create_date,create_user,update_date,update_user FROM android_device_users WHERE delete_time is NULL AND users_id=#{uid} ORDER BY update_date desc LIMIT 1
